Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.debugrender.api.client.render

Class RenderUtils

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.debugrender.api.client.render.RenderUtils
public final class RenderUtils extends Object
Assorted utilities for rendering debug block-nodes.

      Draws a cuboid made of lines.
      Parameters:
      stack - the matrix stack.
      consumer - the vertex consumer.
      x - the x position of the center.
      y - the y position of the center.
      z - the z position of the center.
      width - the x-dimension radius of the cube.
      height - the y-dimension radius of the cube.
      depth - the z-dimension radius of the cube.
      color - the color of the cube as an ARGB integer.

      public static void drawRect(@NotNull @NotNull com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.PoseStack stack, @NotNull @NotNull com.mojang.blaze3d.vertex.VertexConsumer consumer, float x, float y, float z, float radX, float radY, net.minecraft.core.Direction normal, int color)
      Draws a rectangle made of lines in 3D space.
      Parameters:
      stack - the matrix stack.
      consumer - the vertex consumer.
      x - the x position of the center.
      y - the y position of the center.
      z - the z position of the center.
      radX - the half-width of the rectangle.
      radY - the half-height of the rectangle.
      normal - the direction that the rectangle should be facing.
      color - the color as an ARGB integer.

    • graphColor

      public static int graphColor(long graphId)
      Generates a unique ARGB color integer based on a long graph id.
      Parameters:
      graphId - the graph id to use as the seed for the color.
      Returns:
      an ARGB color integer based on the given graph id.

    • distributedEndpoint

      public static net.minecraft.world.phys.Vec3 distributedEndpoint(int nodesAtPos, int indexAmongNodes, net.minecraft.core.Direction side, double verticalOffset, double spacing, double verticalSpacing)
      Calculates the visual position of a block-node on the given side of its block.
      Parameters:
      nodesAtPos - the total number of nodes that are at the given side of a block.
      indexAmongNodes - the index of the current node among the nodes at the given position.
      side - the side of the block that this node is positioned at.
      verticalOffset - how far off from the side (into the block-space) of the block should the center of the node cluster be positioned.
      spacing - the horizontal distance between nodes.
      verticalSpacing - the distance that nodes of different rows are pushed either away from or toward the side of the block to avoid connections clipping through nodes in other rows.
      Returns:
      the visual position of the block-node.

    • distributedEndpoint

      public static net.minecraft.world.phys.Vec3 distributedEndpoint(int nodesAtPos, int indexAmongNodes, double spacing, double verticalSpacing)
      Calculates the visual position of a block-node in the center of its block.
      Parameters:
      nodesAtPos - the total number of nodes that are at the center of the given block.
      indexAmongNodes - the index of the current node among the nodes at the given position.
      spacing - the horizontal distance between nodes.
      verticalSpacing - the distance that nodes of different rows are pushed vertically to avoid connections clipping through nodes in other rows.
      Returns:
      the visual position of the block-node.

    • distributedEndpoint

      public static net.minecraft.world.phys.Vec3 distributedEndpoint(int nodesAtPos, int indexAmongNodes, double centerX, double centerY, double centerZ, double spaceX0, double spaceY0, double spaceZ0, double spaceX1, double spaceY1, double spaceZ1, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ)
      Calculates the visual position of a block-node.
      Parameters:
      nodesAtPos - the total number of nodes that are at the same position as this node.
      indexAmongNodes - the index of the current node among the nodes at the given position.
      centerX - the x position of the center of the cluster of nodes.
      centerY - the y position of the center of the cluster of nodes.
      centerZ - the z position of the center of the cluster of nodes.
      spaceX0 - the x-component of the first spacing vector.
      spaceY0 - the y-component of the first spacing vector.
      spaceZ0 - the z-component of the first spacing vector.
      spaceX1 - the x-component of the second spacing vector.
      spaceY1 - the y-component of the second spacing vector.
      spaceZ1 - the z-component of the second spacing vector.
      offsetX - the x-component of the vertical spacing between rows.
      offsetY - the y-component of the vertical spacing between rows.
      offsetZ - the z-component of the vertical spacing between rows.
      Returns:
      the visual position of the block-node.
